content: भित्ति {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [भिद्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Breaking, splitting; dividing. {@--2@} A wall, partition; समया सौधभित्तिं <ls>Dk.</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 67.</ls> {@--3@} (Hence) Any place, spot or ground (आश्रय) to work anything upon; चित्रकर्मरचना भित्तिं विना वर्तते <ls>Mu. 2. 4.</ls> {@--4@} A fragment, bit, piece, portion. {@--5@} Anything broken. {@--6@} A rent, fissure. {@--7@} A mat. {@--8@} A flaw, defect. {@--9@} An opportunity.
